The Ultimate Toolkit for Getting Things Done

Secure, private, and beautifully designed. Build your perfect productivity space with DoneKit's customizable widgets and themes.

Download AppLearn more
1

Start Your Journey

A seamless onboarding experience designed to get you set up in seconds. No complex sign-ups, just immediate value.

2

Your Personal Space

Organize your life into Spaces. Whether it's 'Home', 'Work', or 'Creative', keep your contexts checked and balanced.

3

Deep Customization

Make it truly yours. Customize every switch and detail. Choose generic icons or upload your own photos for instant recognition.

4

Visual Memories

Attach photos to your tasks. Sometimes a text reminder isn't enough—see exactly what needs to be done.

5

Practice Makes Perfect

Use the Practice mode to build habits. Interactive sessions help reinforce your routine without the pressure.

6

Detailed Insights

Track your progress with detailed lesson views. Understand your patterns and improve your productivity over time.

7

Interactive Mini-Apps

Experience unique mini-apps within DoneKit. Dynamic interactions that bring joy to the mundane.
